name: Vampiric Vanguard
description: The Vampiric Vanguard is a lean undead creature embodying vampiric traits, featuring a robust physique and dark, menacing presence.
memorable: It can heal itself by draining life from its victims and becomes more dangerous when wounded.
goals: To instill fear in enemies, engage in melee combat, and drain the life force of foes.
relations: Often found in the service of more powerful vampire lords or allied with other undead entities.
environment: Commonly encountered in dark places like crypts, ruined castles, or shadowy forests.
strengths: Exemplary in melee combat with healing capabilities linked to its attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to sunlight, wooden weapons, and requires invitation to enter a residence.
attacks: Conducts a multiattack with one Bite and two Claw attacks, draining life and inflicting necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Bloodthirsty ability enhances its melee attacks significantly when health is low.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive perception score of 13.
skills: Has notable dexterity, making it resilient against physical and necrotic damage.
additional_information: Suffers disadvantage on attacks in sunlight.
Restricted entry to places without proper permission.
Destruction condition involves a wooden stake to the heart.
test_queries: creature that drains life and heals
skilled melee undead with climbing ability
vampire with weaknesses to sunlight and wood
strong undead that attacks and heals simultaneously
